author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-368: Generate change events for SubnodeConfigurations when changes of the parent configuration are detected. Also access the root nodes of the child configurations only once when constructing the combined node structure of the CombinedConfiguration to avoid multiple reloads.

sibling we must retrieve the next or previous logical sibling before
